' Towards Galaxy's End ' is an American
Premise
After saving her friend in a car crash, Amina “Ami” is given a second chance at life - as long as she chooses an extinct species. She becomes a space-vampire and upon finding out 6 other girls made the same choice, sets off to form a magical girl team from something that was never meant to be magical at all.
The story is a strange take on the Magical Girl genre, as we come to learn more about these characters and how they got into this predicament. We get to meet a colorful cast from all walks of life, who are met with the chance of choosing what to do with their new found second chance.
Voice Cast
Main
* LaKira Porter as Amina Watson
* Desiree Romero as Sabrina Torres
* Wavez Joestar as "Angel"
* Ethan Waldrep as Luciano
* Madeline Blood as Liliana
Recurring
Production and Release
The studio Luv Letter Studios began production on this back in 2023.
